item.title: Automation Bias
item.description: In our increasingly automated world, we’re constantly bombarded with data, predictions, and recommendations generated by algorithms. While these tools can be incredibly helpful, there’s a sneaky cognitive bias that can lead us astray: Automation Bias. This bias can make us over-rely on these automated systems, even when our own judgment tells us something is wrong. Let’s dive in and explore what it is, why we fall for it, and how to combat it.
